activities: IMT acts as an outsourced database warehousing service provider on behalf of IMT’s clients, and each of IMT’s client’s acts as the Data Controller and Data Owner. IMT collects, processes, and houses personal information on behalf of its clients only as specified by explicit instructions provided to IMT by its clients. IMT will not transfer or disclose personal data to any third party, except as explicitly requested by IMT’s clients and only for the purposes for which it was intended. In the absence of written instructions from its clients, IMT will not be liable for the actions of the Data Controller/owner.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: DMA - Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor Program
